name: glitchtip
description: Glitchtip is a self-hosted alternative to Sentry for error monitoring and performance tracing. It supports multiple language SDKs, dashboards, and alerts, providing complete visibility into app errors and crashes.
features: Error Tracking: Capture and aggregate application errors with detailed stack traces and context.
Performance Monitoring: Track transaction performance and identify slow operations in your applications.
Multi-Language SDKs: Support for Python, JavaScript, PHP, Ruby, and other popular languages.
Sentry Compatible: Drop-in replacement for Sentry with compatible SDK and API.
Issue Management: Group similar errors, assign to team members, and track resolution status.
Release Tracking: Monitor error rates across different application versions and deployments.
Alert Configuration: Set up notifications for new errors or performance degradation.
Self-Hosted Privacy: Keep all error data and user information on your own infrastructure.
